price: Unababurire umunsi w’agahinda, ubwo iteka (ryo kwinjira mu ijuru cyangwa mu muriro) rizacibwa, mu gihe bo (ku isi) nta cyo bitayeho kandi batemera (Allah).
arabic: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-ḥasrati idh quḍiya al-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu'minūna
